G

Gallows - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is part of a hangman game in java.
Gallows() - Constructor for class Gallows
 
guess(char) - Method in class Message
Method used to check if the guessed char is a part of the word to be guessed

H

Hangman - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is responsible for running a hangman game using ur Message and Gallows Classes and JOptionPane messages.
Hangman() - Constructor for class Hangman
 

I

incrementHangman() - Method in class Gallows
Method used to increment the hangman if the user guessed a wrong word.

Method that loops throguh the game for the user.
isDead() - Method in class Gallows
Method used to check if the player has lost the game.

M

Main method used to run our program
Message - Class in <Unnamed>
This class handles the logic of a hangman game in java, it stores the secret words and handles the checking of the guesses as well as the solving of the game
Message() - Constructor for class Message
Default constructor initiates the object with an empty address.

S

solved() - Method in class Message
Method used to check if the word was guessed

T

toString() - Method in class Gallows
Method used to display the hangman drawing at its current stage
toString() - Method in class Message
Method used to output a hidden version of the word with only the guessed letters visible
